participant_1.background:
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
i go to a private high school.
I am not a big sports fan, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

participant_2.background:
I once convinced a police officer that my skunk was a service animal so he'd let me go.
i have the gene that lets me know when someones eaten asparagus.
I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.
i am a drummer in an indie band.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing great! Just working on some new music. What about you?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! Just got back from work. I work at a food pantry and I'm a little tired, but it's a good kind of tired.
That's awesome! I love food pantries. I volunteered at one when I was in high school.
That's great! I love helping people.
What kind of music do you play?
I'm a drummer in an indie band. We're called The Skunks.
Oh cool! I've never heard of you. What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock, pop, and funk.
That sounds awesome! I'd love to hear you play sometime.
We're playing at a local bar this weekend. You should come check us out!
Great! We'd love to see you there.
